MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA11 postcode area of St Helens , affecting properties in Broad Lane , Troutbeck Grove, Dalston Drive, Rothwaite Grove and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties to allow them to carry out repairs safely on our underground cable network and we expect the power to be restored by 1 PM via Generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15 AM on 13th November 2020..
